page.title: 17Beverley Eagles Jazz Band
page.content: The Beverley eagles were formed in 1977. The first competition was in 1980 and our uniform was not good enough to win many dress medals. In the second season we did much better, winning roughly 150 medals and 8 trophies. This was a great improvement from the season before. From then on we started winning nearly every competition. On Saturdays we performed at galas to raise enough money to pay for transport. This season started in early May and we had a good start by becoming, {"Band of the Day",}in the first competition. This year's uniform is white -the fanciest of the lot. Kazoo players wear red, drummers wear blue and the banner section wear yellow.
